summary: This document contains alerts related to Southern Financial LLC and its associated entities, highlighting critical risk factors and past legal issues involving James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. The document details allegations of fraud and a Ponzi scheme linked to Bailey's operations, including Southern Financial Services Inc. and other related companies.

persons.name: James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr.
persons.context: James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. is mentioned as the founder of Southern Financial Services Inc. and is facing federal criminal charges related to a Ponzi scheme.

persons.name: Anne M. Tompkins
persons.context: Anne M. Tompkins announced the initial appearance of James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. on federal criminal charges.

connections.description: Anne M. Tompkins is the U.S. Attorney prosecuting James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. for his alleged involvement in a Ponzi scheme.

events.title: Initial Appearance of James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr.
events.description: James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. had his initial appearance on three federal criminal counts including Securities Fraud, Mail Fraud, and Filing False Tax Returns.

keyFacts: James W. 'Bin' Bailey, Jr. is accused of running a Ponzi scheme that defrauded investors of more than $13 million.
The charges against Bailey include Securities Fraud, Mail Fraud, and Filing False Tax Returns.
Southern Financial Services Inc. was involved in fraudulent activities related to asset management and investment services.
The document alerts to critical risk factors associated with Southern Financial LLC and its related entities.
